bio: His fiery heart and body always make him feel too hot. Being near him is like being near a space heater.

soultimate.name: Heat Wave
soultimate.description: Burn foes for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacking, 1% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
skill.name: Seeing Red

name: Swelterrier
